docs.snippet: AMERICAN football and its cousin soccer having taken root abroad, many countries have issued stamps honoring these sports. A few of the sets are deemed to be of the punt-pass-andprayer variety; they fill no existing postal need, and are passed on to...
docs.lead_paragraph: AMERICAN football and its cousin soccer having taken root abroad, many countries have issued stamps honoring these sports. A few of the sets are deemed to be of the punt-pass-andprayer variety; they fill no existing postal need, and are passed on to collectors.

docs.snippet: A drop in export orders which has materialized in the midst of an active season and at a time when volume normally would be approaching its annual peak, mystified exporters of manufactured goods here this week.

docs.snippet: The proposal of the Cuban Government to all the American governments for mediation of the Spanish civil war has been rejected by the United States. A note delivered to the Foreign Office in Havana by J. Butler Wright, the United States Ambassador,...
docs.lead_paragraph: The proposal of the Cuban Government to all the American governments for mediation of the Spanish civil war has been rejected by the United States. A note delivered to the Foreign Office in Havana by J. Butler Wright, the United States Ambassador, was made public today by the State Department here.
docs.abstract: Say Mex will probably decline Cuba's bid to mediate Spanish conflict

headline.main: U. S. REJECTS BID OF CUBA ON SPAIN; Will Not Participate With Other American Nations in Mediating Conflict
